headline.main: 8 SENATORS ATTACK LEASE-LEND BILL; Gen. Wood Issues Statements by Members of Three Parties

lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Feb. 1 (UP) -- General Robert E. Wood, chairman of the American First Committee, said tonight he had been authorized by eight members of the United States Senate to issue statements of their opposition of the Administration's lease-lend bill.
